usage.searchProtocol: 1. Search keywords in searchableContent[].searchText using string matching. 2. Cross-reference with topicIndex for quick topic lookups. 3. Fetch full transcript from transcripts/{videoId}.json for detailed content.
usage.example: Query 'webhook authentication' → matches 3FfCRbq3XMs → read transcripts/3FfCRbq3XMs.json for full guidance
